messages.title: NHS funding pledge
messages.content: I'm incredibly proud that the Liberal Democrats have committed to giving the NHS the funding it needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase NHS budget by £8 billion a year and reduce health waiting times, while achieving equality in healthcare and maintaining world-class service.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only I can beat the Conservative Helen Grant. We know the Conservatives can be beaten. It is going to be very close—please use your vote to gain a hardworking local MP.

issues.health: The NHS has saved my life and been there for my children. As your local campaigner, I have worked to improve health services locally. In particular, I have pressed for more money for local surgeries.

housing.content: At the same time the Conservative council are allowing a vast number of new houses to be built in Maidstone & the Weald when local people are telling me that they already have a problem getting an appointment with their GP.

leaflet.personalStatement: The NHS has saved my life and there for my children. I'm incredibly proud that the Liberal Democrats have committed to giving the NHS the funding it needs.

contactInformation.address: Howard De Walden Centre Bluett Street Maidstone ME14 2UG

images.caption: Jasper Gerard interacting with constituents and professionals.
